TopicTitle: How do you edit a table in the wiki?

Articles.Content:
I can see the reference in double braces to the table, but I don't know where the table itself is stored.

I was hoping there's an easy method to edit it as well.

Happy landings!

edit: Never mind. I found it. So much for an easy way to edit it.
